notes: base lemma; often used in the plural to mean 'luggage'
example_sentence_english: This piece of luggage is heavy.
I have some bags to check in.

example_sentence_italian: Il peso del bagaglio è limitato.
example_sentence_english: The weight of the luggage is limited.

Remove the liquid from the luggage.
